mapper.insert: insert into card_info ( card_name, mno, card_num, exp_date1, exp_date2, cvc_code, card_pwd, used_date, reg_date ) values ( #{card_name}, #{mno}, #{card_num}, #{exp_date1}, #{exp_date2}, #{cvc_code}, #{card_pwd}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select cc.card_no, cc.card_name, cc.mno , concat(left(cc.card_num, 5), '****-****', right(cc.card_num, 5)) card_num , cc.exp_date1, cc.exp_date2 , cc.cvc_code, cc.card_pwd, cc.used_date, cc.reg_date from card_info cc, member m where cc.mno = #{mno} and cc.del_yn = 0 and cc.mno = m.mno order by cc.used_date desc
